channel.title: - SigmaScape Development Team - Join Now -
channel.description:
[img]http://greek.villanova.edu/zetapsi/sigma.gif[/img] Hello, and welcome to the SigmaScape Development Team's forum page!
I'm making my own private server, which is going to be VERY ALIKE with runescape itself. But, i'm hoping to make it better. I can't do this all on my own, though, so I need a development team to help me. The positions I have are CODERS and TESTERS. Once this server is up and running, all of the coders and testers, if wanted, will become the moderators and administrators of the server.
Ok, you may be wondering, why the hell do I want to join your server? True, you could join anyone elses, or make one yourself. But, working in a team like this has it's benifits. For one, we all can learn together off of each other's talents rather then working alone. Also, new ideas can come easy, and can become much better in a team like this. If I still didn't convince you to join, then you are going to miss out on (HOPEFULLY) one of the best servers ever created!
By now, if you are still reading, you may be interested in applying for a position. Copy the form below, and fill it out with the correct information:
Position Wanted: Experience: Reliability: AIM Username: Other Information That I Should Know:
We will be using AIM the majority of the time to communicate, although we can use the server itself as a place to talk and get new ideas.
CODERS: Twisted Fun Zanzibar
TESTERS: Twisted Fun Zanzibar
Current Goals: ~~~~~~~~~ All Working Special Attacks Full Prayer w/ Head Icons New Starting Town ~~~~~~~~~
Rules for Forum: ~~~~~~~~~~~ No FLAMMING No SPAMMING No LEECHING ~~~~~~~~~~~
Thank You! ;D
Twisted Fun[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 02:35:55 PM[/size][hr]RESERVED

@Twisted_Fun wrote:


Hello, and welcome to the SigmaScape Development Team’s forum page!

I’m making my own private server, which is going to be VERY ALIKE with runescape itself. But, i’m hoping to make it better. I can’t do this all on my own, though, so I need a development team to help me. The positions I have are CODERS and TESTERS. Once this server is up and running, all of the coders and testers, if wanted, will become the moderators and administrators of the server.

Ok, you may be wondering, why the hell do I want to join your server? True, you could join anyone elses, or make one yourself. But, working in a team like this has it’s benifits. For one, we all can learn together off of each other’s talents rather then working alone. Also, new ideas can come easy, and can become much better in a team like this. If I still didn’t convince you to join, then you are going to miss out on (HOPEFULLY) one of the best servers ever created!
